name: sls-rust-minimal
description: Deployment tools for the minimal Serverless Rust application.
author: Christian Kjaer <ckl@codetalk.io>

scripts.deploy: npm run build:clean && npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy
scripts.build: rustup target add x86_64-unknown-linux-musl && cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl && mkdir -p ./target/cdk/release && cp ./target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/release/bootstrap ./target/cdk/release/bootstrap
scripts.build:clean: rm -r ./target/cdk/release || echo '[build:clean] No existing release found.'
scripts.cdk:deploy: [[ $CI == 'true' ]] && export CDK_APPROVAL='never' || export CDK_APPROVAL='broadening'; cdk deploy --require-approval $CDK_APPROVAL $npm_package_name
scripts.cdk:bootstrap: cdk bootstrap aws://$(aws sts get-caller-identity | jq -r .Account)/$AWS_REGION
scripts.cdklocal:deploy: npm run --silent cdklocal:clear-cache && CDK_LOCAL=true AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 cdklocal deploy --require-approval never $npm_package_name
scripts.cdklocal:bootstrap: npm run --silent cdklocal:clear-cache && CDK_LOCAL=true AWS_REGION=eu-west-1 cdklocal bootstrap aws://000000000000/eu-west-1
